content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":259852,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259853,"originalJapaneseLine":"親友と共にここまでの冒険が語られます","translatedEnglishLine":"The adventure up to this point is recounted together with a close friend."},{"lineNumber":259854,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか適当にそれなりに二人で冒険してきて今終盤に来た所という感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like they’ve just adventured together somewhat casually and have now reached the final stages."},{"lineNumber":259855,"originalJapaneseLine":"２週間ほどの冒険","translatedEnglishLine":"An adventure lasting about two weeks."},{"lineNumber":259856,"originalJapaneseLine":"　トリプルハニーを探し沢山倒した、たまに落とす日章旗を３０個集めて","translatedEnglishLine":"They searched for Triple Hanny and defeated many, occasionally collecting 30 rising sun flags they dropped."},{"lineNumber":259857,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それをとあるハニーに渡す事で、天空のハーモニカをなんとか手に入れて","translatedEnglishLine":"By giving those to a certain Hanny, they somehow obtained the Sky Harmonica."},{"lineNumber":259858,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを使ってここまできたとか・・　ＭＭＯぽいノリで","translatedEnglishLine":"Using that, they came this far... with an MMO-like vibe."},{"lineNumber":259859,"originalJapaneseLine":"など","translatedEnglishLine":"And so on."},{"lineNumber":259860,"originalJapaneseLine":"固有の友情イベント　１回目","translatedEnglishLine":"Unique friendship event - first time."},{"lineNumber":259861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259862,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここでは、戦闘を混ぜながら親友別の固有イベントが３つ発生します","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, three unique events for each close friend occur mixed with battles."},{"lineNumber":259863,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、友情フェイズのイベントである程度は関係を済ませているので","translatedEnglishLine":"However, since the relationship is somewhat settled through the Friendship Phase events,"},{"lineNumber":259864,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここでは１番信頼出来る親友として仲が良いシーンを入れるだけでいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"here it’s sufficient to include a scene showing the closest trusted friend getting along well."},{"lineNumber":259865,"originalJapaneseLine":"　２．３台詞でもかまわないです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Two or three lines of dialogue are fine."},{"lineNumber":259866,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大事なのは一緒に行動している事","translatedEnglishLine":"The important thing is that they are acting together."},{"lineNumber":259867,"originalJapaneseLine":"　告白とかも入れてもいいです、ただエロまではいきません、よくてキス。","translatedEnglishLine":"Confessions are okay too, but it doesn’t go as far as erotic scenes; at best, a kiss."},{"lineNumber":259868,"originalJapaneseLine":"固有の友情イベント　２回目","translatedEnglishLine":"Unique friendship event - second time."},{"lineNumber":259869,"originalJapaneseLine":"固有の友情イベント　３回目","translatedEnglishLine":"Unique friendship event - third time."},{"lineNumber":259870,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time,"},{"lineNumber":259871,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックー、母達のシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukko and the mothers' scene."},{"lineNumber":259872,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人サテラに奪われた氷柱シィルの情報を得る、","translatedEnglishLine":"They obtain information about the ice pillar Seal stolen by the demon Satella,"},{"lineNumber":259873,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは壊す事も出来ずにランスにばれないように側に置いている","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella can neither destroy it and keeps it nearby without letting Rance find out."},{"lineNumber":259874,"originalJapaneseLine":"これを伝えたのはビスケッタさんでもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"It might be okay if Biscetta was the one who conveyed this."},{"lineNumber":259875,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile,"},{"lineNumber":259876,"originalJapaneseLine":"エール以外の仲間達の冒険","translatedEnglishLine":"The adventure of the companions other than Yell."},{"lineNumber":259877,"originalJapaneseLine":"ペア化しているのはそれも見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Show that they are paired up as well."},{"lineNumber":259878,"originalJapaneseLine":"雲の上を進んでいると・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"As they proceed above the clouds..."},{"lineNumber":259879,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーキングが一匹立っています。にこにこしている","translatedEnglishLine":"A Hanny King is standing alone, smiling happily."},{"lineNumber":259880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「真面目ですねー、それに強い、かっこいい。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're serious, strong, and cool.\""},{"lineNumber":259881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな素敵な貴方たちに退治して欲しい怠け者がいます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There is a lazy one I'd like you wonderful people to exterminate.\""},{"lineNumber":259882,"originalJapaneseLine":"？？？","translatedEnglishLine":"???"},{"lineNumber":259883,"originalJapaneseLine":"急に落下していくエール（と彼女か彼氏）","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell (and her or his partner) suddenly fall downward."},{"lineNumber":259884,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひゅーーーー","translatedEnglishLine":"Whooooosh—"},{"lineNumber":259885,"originalJapaneseLine":"　天空　→　空　→　地上　→　地底","translatedEnglishLine":"Sky → Air → Ground → Underground"},{"lineNumber":259886,"originalJapaneseLine":"　空から急降下・・うわーーー","translatedEnglishLine":"A rapid descent from the sky... whoa—"},{"lineNumber":259887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　地上に落ちるーーと思った瞬間、地上もすり抜ける・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as they think they will land on the ground—they pass right through it..."},{"lineNumber":259888,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして地下をするすると落ちていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Then they smoothly fall through underground."},{"lineNumber":259889,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分が透明になった感じで通り抜けていくイメージ","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like becoming transparent and passing through."},{"lineNumber":259890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259891,"originalJapaneseLine":"どん、何かにぶつかった・・いてて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Bang! They hit something... ouch..."},{"lineNumber":259892,"originalJapaneseLine":"見ると、ぶつかったのは　魔人ますぞえ　こっちもイテテとしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking closely, what they hit was the demon Masuzoe, who is also hurting."},{"lineNumber":259893,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニ子「なんですのー、急に空からふってきて　寝ているますぞえ様にぶつかるなんてー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haniko: \"What the heck—falling suddenly from the sky and bumping into the sleeping Masuzoe-sama!\""},{"lineNumber":259894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ますぞえ「ぐぐぐ・・怒った、まだ３００年は本気を出すつもりは無かったが、今本気を出す」","translatedEnglishLine":"Masuzoe: \"Grrr... I'm angry. I didn’t intend to get serious for another 300 years, but now I will.\""},{"lineNumber":259895,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニ子「すごい、ますぞえ様が本気だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haniko: \"Amazing, Masuzoe-sama is serious.\""},{"lineNumber":259896,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":259897,"originalJapaneseLine":"雲の上を進んでいると・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"As they move above the clouds..."},{"lineNumber":259898,"originalJapaneseLine":"ますぞえのように怪しげな称え言葉が聞こえてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"They hear suspicious praise words like those of Masuzoe."},{"lineNumber":259899,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして","translatedEnglishLine":"And then,"},{"lineNumber":259900,"originalJapaneseLine":"神々しい光と共に　天空の王かわぞえ　が現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"With a divine light, the Sky King Kawazoe appears."},{"lineNumber":259901,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニ子が解説","translatedEnglishLine":"Haniko provides an explanation."},{"lineNumber":259902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奈落の王より受け継いだ魔血魂により産まれた新たな魔人ハニー","translatedEnglishLine":"A new demon Hanny born from the Demon Blood Soul inherited from the King of the Abyss."},{"lineNumber":259903,"originalJapaneseLine":"　永遠に来ない本気になる時を予告し続けた奈落の王とは違い","translatedEnglishLine":"Unlike the King of the Abyss, who continued to announce he would never seriously act,"},{"lineNumber":259904,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつかは来るかもしれないラグナロクを待つ者","translatedEnglishLine":"He waits for Ragnarok, which may someday come."},{"lineNumber":259905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラグナロクが来たら世界を滅ぼす、今はまだその時では無い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When Ragnarok comes, I will destroy the world. But that time is not yet.\""},{"lineNumber":259906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが・・・」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""},{"lineNumber":259907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが・・・」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""},{"lineNumber":259908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「・・・10分後か、1000万年後か分からぬラグナロクを待つのは飽きた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm tired of waiting for Ragnarok, whether it is in 10 minutes or 10 million years.\""},{"lineNumber":259909,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニ子「えっ、また待ち始めて１５年ぐらいしか立ってないのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haniko: \"Huh? It’s been only about 15 years since you started waiting again.\""},{"lineNumber":259910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日、今、この時を　ラグナロクとする　滅べ人間！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today, right now, this moment shall be Ragnarok. Perish, humans!\""},{"lineNumber":259911,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親友と共にここまでの冒険が語られます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure up to this point is recounted together with a close friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか適当にそれなりに二人で冒険してきて今終盤に来た所という感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like they’ve just adventured together somewhat casually and have now reached the final stages.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２週間ほどの冒険
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An adventure lasting about two weeks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トリプルハニーを探し沢山倒した、たまに落とす日章旗を３０個集めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They searched for Triple Hanny and defeated many, occasionally collecting 30 rising sun flags they dropped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをとあるハニーに渡す事で、天空のハーモニカをなんとか手に入れて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By giving those to a certain Hanny, they somehow obtained the Sky Harmonica.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを使ってここまできたとか・・　ＭＭＯぽいノリで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using that, they came this far... with an MMO-like vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: など
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固有の友情イベント　１回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unique friendship event - first time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでは、戦闘を混ぜながら親友別の固有イベントが３つ発生します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, three unique events for each close friend occur mixed with battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、友情フェイズのイベントである程度は関係を済ませているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, since the relationship is somewhat settled through the Friendship Phase events,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでは１番信頼出来る親友として仲が良いシーンを入れるだけでいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: here it’s sufficient to include a scene showing the closest trusted friend getting along well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２．３台詞でもかまわないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two or three lines of dialogue are fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事なのは一緒に行動している事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The important thing is that they are acting together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 告白とかも入れてもいいです、ただエロまではいきません、よくてキス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Confessions are okay too, but it doesn’t go as far as erotic scenes; at best, a kiss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固有の友情イベント　２回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unique friendship event - second time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固有の友情イベント　３回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unique friendship event - third time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、母達のシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukko and the mothers' scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラに奪われた氷柱シィルの情報を得る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They obtain information about the ice pillar Seal stolen by the demon Satella,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは壊す事も出来ずにランスにばれないように側に置いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella can neither destroy it and keeps it nearby without letting Rance find out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを伝えたのはビスケッタさんでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be okay if Biscetta was the one who conveyed this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール以外の仲間達の冒険
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure of the companions other than Yell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペア化しているのはそれも見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show that they are paired up as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲の上を進んでいると・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they proceed above the clouds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングが一匹立っています。にこにこしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Hanny King is standing alone, smiling happily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真面目ですねー、それに強い、かっこいい。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're serious, strong, and cool."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな素敵な貴方たちに退治して欲しい怠け者がいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is a lazy one I'd like you wonderful people to exterminate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急に落下していくエール（と彼女か彼氏）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell (and her or his partner) suddenly fall downward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひゅーーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whooooosh—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天空　→　空　→　地上　→　地底
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sky → Air → Ground → Underground

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空から急降下・・うわーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A rapid descent from the sky... whoa—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に落ちるーーと思った瞬間、地上もすり抜ける・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as they think they will land on the ground—they pass right through it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして地下をするすると落ちていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then they smoothly fall through underground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が透明になった感じで通り抜けていくイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like becoming transparent and passing through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どん、何かにぶつかった・・いてて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bang! They hit something... ouch...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見ると、ぶつかったのは　魔人ますぞえ　こっちもイテテとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking closely, what they hit was the demon Masuzoe, who is also hurting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子「なんですのー、急に空からふってきて　寝ているますぞえ様にぶつかるなんてー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko: "What the heck—falling suddenly from the sky and bumping into the sleeping Masuzoe-sama!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえ「ぐぐぐ・・怒った、まだ３００年は本気を出すつもりは無かったが、今本気を出す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masuzoe: "Grrr... I'm angry. I didn’t intend to get serious for another 300 years, but now I will."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子「すごい、ますぞえ様が本気だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko: "Amazing, Masuzoe-sama is serious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲の上を進んでいると・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they move above the clouds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえのように怪しげな称え言葉が聞こえてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They hear suspicious praise words like those of Masuzoe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神々しい光と共に　天空の王かわぞえ　が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a divine light, the Sky King Kawazoe appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子が解説
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko provides an explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奈落の王より受け継いだ魔血魂により産まれた新たな魔人ハニー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new demon Hanny born from the Demon Blood Soul inherited from the King of the Abyss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永遠に来ない本気になる時を予告し続けた奈落の王とは違い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike the King of the Abyss, who continued to announce he would never seriously act,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつかは来るかもしれないラグナロクを待つ者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He waits for Ragnarok, which may someday come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラグナロクが来たら世界を滅ぼす、今はまだその時では無い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When Ragnarok comes, I will destroy the world. But that time is not yet."
"However..."
"However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「・・・10分後か、1000万年後か分からぬラグナロクを待つのは飽きた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm tired of waiting for Ragnarok, whether it is in 10 minutes or 10 million years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子「えっ、また待ち始めて１５年ぐらいしか立ってないのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko: "Huh? It’s been only about 15 years since you started waiting again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日、今、この時を　ラグナロクとする　滅べ人間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, right now, this moment shall be Ragnarok. Perish, humans!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親友と共にここまでの冒険が語られます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure up to this point is recounted together with a close friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか適当にそれなりに二人で冒険してきて今終盤に来た所という感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like they’ve just adventured together somewhat casually and have now reached the final stages.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２週間ほどの冒険
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An adventure lasting about two weeks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トリプルハニーを探し沢山倒した、たまに落とす日章旗を３０個集めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They searched for Triple Hanny and defeated many, occasionally collecting 30 rising sun flags they dropped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをとあるハニーに渡す事で、天空のハーモニカをなんとか手に入れて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By giving those to a certain Hanny, they somehow obtained the Sky Harmonica.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを使ってここまできたとか・・　ＭＭＯぽいノリで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using that, they came this far... with an MMO-like vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: など
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固有の友情イベント　１回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unique friendship event - first time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでは、戦闘を混ぜながら親友別の固有イベントが３つ発生します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, three unique events for each close friend occur mixed with battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、友情フェイズのイベントである程度は関係を済ませているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, since the relationship is somewhat settled through the Friendship Phase events,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでは１番信頼出来る親友として仲が良いシーンを入れるだけでいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: here it’s sufficient to include a scene showing the closest trusted friend getting along well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２．３台詞でもかまわないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two or three lines of dialogue are fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事なのは一緒に行動している事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The important thing is that they are acting together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 告白とかも入れてもいいです、ただエロまではいきません、よくてキス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Confessions are okay too, but it doesn’t go as far as erotic scenes; at best, a kiss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固有の友情イベント　２回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unique friendship event - second time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固有の友情イベント　３回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unique friendship event - third time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、母達のシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukko and the mothers' scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラに奪われた氷柱シィルの情報を得る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They obtain information about the ice pillar Seal stolen by the demon Satella,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは壊す事も出来ずにランスにばれないように側に置いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella can neither destroy it and keeps it nearby without letting Rance find out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを伝えたのはビスケッタさんでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be okay if Biscetta was the one who conveyed this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール以外の仲間達の冒険
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure of the companions other than Yell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペア化しているのはそれも見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show that they are paired up as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲の上を進んでいると・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they proceed above the clouds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングが一匹立っています。にこにこしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Hanny King is standing alone, smiling happily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真面目ですねー、それに強い、かっこいい。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're serious, strong, and cool."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな素敵な貴方たちに退治して欲しい怠け者がいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is a lazy one I'd like you wonderful people to exterminate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急に落下していくエール（と彼女か彼氏）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell (and her or his partner) suddenly fall downward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひゅーーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whooooosh—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天空　→　空　→　地上　→　地底
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sky → Air → Ground → Underground

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空から急降下・・うわーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A rapid descent from the sky... whoa—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に落ちるーーと思った瞬間、地上もすり抜ける・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as they think they will land on the ground—they pass right through it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして地下をするすると落ちていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then they smoothly fall through underground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が透明になった感じで通り抜けていくイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like becoming transparent and passing through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どん、何かにぶつかった・・いてて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bang! They hit something... ouch...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見ると、ぶつかったのは　魔人ますぞえ　こっちもイテテとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking closely, what they hit was the demon Masuzoe, who is also hurting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子「なんですのー、急に空からふってきて　寝ているますぞえ様にぶつかるなんてー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko: "What the heck—falling suddenly from the sky and bumping into the sleeping Masuzoe-sama!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえ「ぐぐぐ・・怒った、まだ３００年は本気を出すつもりは無かったが、今本気を出す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masuzoe: "Grrr... I'm angry. I didn’t intend to get serious for another 300 years, but now I will."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子「すごい、ますぞえ様が本気だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko: "Amazing, Masuzoe-sama is serious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲の上を進んでいると・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they move above the clouds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえのように怪しげな称え言葉が聞こえてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They hear suspicious praise words like those of Masuzoe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神々しい光と共に　天空の王かわぞえ　が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a divine light, the Sky King Kawazoe appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子が解説
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko provides an explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奈落の王より受け継いだ魔血魂により産まれた新たな魔人ハニー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new demon Hanny born from the Demon Blood Soul inherited from the King of the Abyss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永遠に来ない本気になる時を予告し続けた奈落の王とは違い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike the King of the Abyss, who continued to announce he would never seriously act,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつかは来るかもしれないラグナロクを待つ者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He waits for Ragnarok, which may someday come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラグナロクが来たら世界を滅ぼす、今はまだその時では無い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When Ragnarok comes, I will destroy the world. But that time is not yet."
"However..."
"However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「・・・10分後か、1000万年後か分からぬラグナロクを待つのは飽きた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm tired of waiting for Ragnarok, whether it is in 10 minutes or 10 million years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子「えっ、また待ち始めて１５年ぐらいしか立ってないのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniko: "Huh? It’s been only about 15 years since you started waiting again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日、今、この時を　ラグナロクとする　滅べ人間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, right now, this moment shall be Ragnarok. Perish, humans!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle
